title: Judge Curbs Actions of Election-Monitoring Group in Arizona
description: The group may not take photos or videos of voters, openly carry firearms near ballot boxes, or post information about voters online, a federal judge ruled.
dc:creator: Ken Bensinger
media:credit: Rebecca Noble for The New York Times
media:description: A secure election drop box on Tuesday in Phoenix. A federal judge in Arizona placed limits on an election-monitoring group that had been watching ballot boxes.
